text__shop_not_found: Ohh no, we can't find the shop. Please check the link again

text__default_error_title: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again or

text__unhandled_error_description: Try refreshing the page, or if it won't help, we will knock our developer door to get rid of this nasty error.
